sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Transportation Network Providers Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Transportation Network Providers Act.

sections.heading: Preemption. A unit of local government, whether or
sections.text:
not it is a home rule unit, may not regulate transportation
network companies, transportation network company drivers, or
transportation network company services in a manner that is
less restrictive than the regulation by the State under this
Act. This Section is a limitation under subsection (i) of
Section 6 of Article VII of the Illinois Constitution on the
concurrent exercise by home rule units of powers and functions exercised by the State.

sections.heading: Repeal. This Act is repealed on September 1, 2028.
sections.text: Repeal. This Act is repealed on September 1, 2028.
